definition: fence/railing/hurdle/column or box (of text or other data)
stick/pole/lever/classifier for long objects such as guns

sentences.english: I suspended a rope-ladder from the rail of the ship.
sentences.chinese: 我将一个软梯悬挂在船栏杆上。

sentences.english: The upper staircase is suspended from the ceiling by white rods that create a minimal balustrade.
sentences.chinese: 上层楼梯利用从天花板悬挂下的白棒作为扶手栏杆。

sentences.english: Dora tied her dog to the street railings.
sentences.chinese: 朵拉把她的狗拴在街旁的栏杆上了。

sentences.english: The two women leaned upon the wrought-iron window rail in the shadow of the curtains.
sentences.chinese: 两个女人在窗帘的遮掩下，把胳膊肘支在铁栏杆上。

sentences.english: The albino drew a pistol from his coat and aimed the barrel through the bars, directly at the curator.
sentences.chinese: 他从外套中拔出手枪，将枪管透过铁栏杆瞄准了馆长。

sentences.english: He fell out of the window and was impaled on the iron railings.
sentences.chinese: 他从窗口跌下去，身体被铁栏杆刺穿了。

sentences.english: Hand rails and banisters shall be constructed for stainless steel pipe.
sentences.chinese: 扶手和栏杆支柱为不锈钢制。

sentences.english: Iron and iron baluster between, only can hold the monkey arm outstretched.
sentences.chinese: 铁栏杆与铁栏杆之间，仅能容得下猴子的手臂伸出来。

sentences.english: Iron and iron baluster between, only can hold the monkey arm outstretched.
sentences.chinese: 铁栏杆与铁栏杆之间，仅能容得下猴子的手臂伸出来。

sentences.english: A girl leans on a highway railing on the outskirts of Lubango January 14.
sentences.chinese: 一个女孩靠上了关于郊区公路栏杆卢班戈1月14日。

sentences.english: She is walking on the railing of a bridge.
sentences.chinese: 她正在大桥的栏杆上走。

sentences.english: Prefabricated modular bays of hot dip galvanized balustrading are constructed off site.
sentences.chinese: 热沾电渡栏杆的预制弯道模型是建造在场所之外的。

sentences.english: These consist of weldnesh , steel angles and a scaffold pole handrail.
sentences.chinese: 这些由焊接盎格鲁钢铁和脚手立杆组成的栏杆。

sentences.english: He arched over the banister to grab her hand.
sentences.chinese: 他拱起身子越过栏杆去抓她的手。

sentences.english: I put my hand on metal railings and snatch it away, burnt.
sentences.chinese: 我刚把手搭到金属栏杆上立刻便缩了回来，烫得要命。

sentences.english: They railed in their vegetable garden.
sentences.chinese: 他们用栏杆将他们的菜园围起来。

definition: sides of a ship/ship's railing/fig. the dividing line between shipboard expenses and onshore freight charges
Huatan township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
decorative mass planting of flowers and shrubs, often bounded by a low masonry border, and often part of a streetscape
